## Known Limitations & Future Work
1. **Static sitemap**: Currently uses a static sitemap.xml file. If more public routes are added in the future, consider migrating to vite-plugin-sitemap for automatic generation.
2. **Date in sitemap**: The lastmod date (2024-12-31) is static. For a marketing site with infrequent updates, this is acceptable.
